DOC.brief_summary: Swallowing dysfunction delay oral feeding skill premature infant significantly delay discharge hospital . Thickening oral formula breast milk feed commercial thickener rice cereal use nursery goal promote development adequate feeding skill . The objective pilot study examine effect thicken feed premature infant oral feed difficulty due dysfunction secondary immature swallow . Hypotheses : - Thickened feed lead reduction symptom secondary immature swallow 32-40 week gestational age infant compare non-thickened feed - Thickened feed promote transition hospital discharge .
DOC.brief_title: Promotion Thickened Feeds Manage Newborns With Feeding Difficulties
